notes: Regular fitness levels maintained. Cleared for all activities.
Passed pre-season medical examination with flying colors.
Sustained during training on Jan 5th. Expected return in 1-2 weeks with proper rest and physiotherapy.
treatmentPlan: Rest, ice, compression, elevation (RICE protocol). Daily physiotherapy sessions focusing on range of motion and strength exercises.
recoveryTimeline: 1-2 weeks with proper rest and physiotherapy

notes: Recent recovery from hamstring strain completed successfully. Full training resumed.
Minor collision during match. No structural damage. Light training for next week.
treatmentPlan: Anti-inflammatory medication, ice application, modified training regimen with focus on upper body conditioning.
recoveryTimeline: 5-7 days light training, full return expected next week

notes: Excellent physical condition. Leading team fitness assessments.
Showing signs of overtraining. Workload reduced for monitoring period.
treatmentPlan: Reduced training intensity, focus on recovery protocols, sports psychology consultation for workload management.
recoveryTimeline: 2-3 weeks monitoring period with gradual return to full training

notes: Young player showing excellent adaptation to professional training intensity.
Injury occurred during match on Jan 20th. MRI confirmed complete ACL tear. Surgery scheduled.
treatmentPlan: ACL reconstruction surgery followed by 6-month rehabilitation program. Initial 6 weeks non-weight bearing, then progressive strengthening.
recoveryTimeline: 6-9 months full recovery with surgical intervention and intensive rehabilitation
